tool_description: Get the MP4 of Any Youtube Video
name: YoutubeMP4
title: YoutubeMP4

api_list.name: Get Video MP4 URL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtubemp4.p.rapidapi.com/get?id=dQw4w9WgXcQ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtubemp4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtubemp4.p.rapidapi.com/get?id={id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtubemp4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
